videogames.name: League of Legends
videogames.description: An multiplayer online battle arena game that pits two teams against each other, with a total of 10 players. It is a competitive online game that blends the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements.

videogames.name: Battlefield Series
videogames.description: A series of first person shooter games that features a particular focus on large maps, teamwork and vehicle warfare, compared to many other FPS games.

videogames.name: Diablo 3
videogames.description: An action role-playing game, with a lot of focus on loot.

foods.name: Sushi
foods.description: A type food that originated from Japane, Sushi can be prepared with either brown or white rice. It is often prepared with raw seafood, but some common varieties of sushi use cooked ingredients, and many other sorts are vegetarian.

foods.name: Juicy Lucy Burgers
foods.description: The Juicy Lucy is a cheeseburger that has the cheese inside the meat patty instead of on top, resulting in a melted core of cheese within the patty.

foods.name: Pho
foods.description: Pho Vietnamese noodle soup consisting of broth, rice noodles and meat.
